data.text:
About Cotton College State University, Assam (CCSU)

Cotton College State University came into existence in the year 1901 and it was named in honor of Sir Henry Stedman Cotton for appreciating his real concern for the cause of higher education in the local region. Cotton College State University, the 116-year-old College in Guwahati has been upgraded to Cotton University. Cotton College is an institution of higher education located in the heart of Guwahati, Assam, a northeastern state of India. The university currently has faculties for Physical, Chemical and Mathematical Sciences, Life Sciences, Earth Sciences, Languages, Literature and Linguistics, Human and Social Sciences.

Cotton College State University Exam Time Table / Date Sheet

The students those appear in the Cotton College State University examination 2019 for the UG and PG courses CCSU had planned to organize the examinations for all first, Second and Third parts and all those who were preparing for it must need the dates to prepare according to it. We hope this exam timetable will be helpful to make a study plan according to your work schedule. If more details to go and visit the official webpage of the university.

All the students are informed that the huge number of students are pursuing in the Cotton College State University in various Courses. Now this time all the students are required the Gulbarga University Undergraduate and Postgraduate Exam Time Table 2019 for the Exam Preparation. We are suggested all the students of the Cotton College State University not announced the Exam Programme yet but it will be published as soon on the official web portal in the upcoming month. So, all the students continue their study for getting the higher score in this examination. Here we are provided direct links to download Exam Date Sheet.

CCSU Exam Admit Card / Hall Ticket Download

Cotton College State University Admit cards 2019 Examinations for Undergraduate/ Postgraduate courses will begin shortly at the examination centers allotted by the Cotton College State University. The detailed Examination events/ exam dates/ Exam center & Roll no shall be mentioned in the Exam Admit cards. Cotton College State University Summer 2019 Admit cards shall be anticipated through university website 2 weeks preceding to Exams.

The admit card for Cotton College State University Examination 2019 is issued. The download process of admit card will be done in two-phase. Firstly, the admit card will be issued for those students who submitted their application form without the late fee. After that admit card will be issued for those students who submitted their application form against a late fee. The direct link will be made available here when the official body will start issuing admit card.

Cotton College State University Admission 2019

For Bachelor of Science and Arts courses, candidates will be admitted on the basis of merit secured by the candidates in the appropriate major subject in which they are seeking admission. For this purpose, the college follows the practice of preparing the merit list of candidates for each major subject with credit point as the criteria for selection.

For Postgraduate courses, admission is done based on the marks secured by the candidates in their Undergraduate examination keeping in view the reservation policy followed by the Assam Government.

Online Exam Form of Cotton College State University

The university form will be available in only offline mode. The application form will be available in April 2019. The University will provide different application forms for the different courses. The student must bring all the information such as the photocopy of acknowledgment slip and fee payment Chalan, photo for pass photo for future reference.

Cotton College State University Major Courses

List of courses offered by Cotton College State University (CCSU)

Bachelor of Arts [BA]

Bachelor of Science [B.Sc]

Bachelor of Computer Application [BCA]

Master of Arts [M.A]

Master of Science [M.Sc]

Master of Computer Applications [M.C.A]

Diploma

Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Applications [PGDCA]

Certification

Advanced Certificate of Proficiency in French

Affiliated Colleges for CCSU
